original: Lundin, Eric Gunnar, överinspektör v. SJ, Göteborg, f. 8/12/85 i Sthlm av stat :mäst. Johan Wilhelm L. o. Stina Andersson. G. 20 m. Elise Holmgren. Barn: Elsa f. 21, Lars 27. — Realex. 08. Stat:skrdv. 12, förste stat:skriv. i Hälsingborg 30, byråassist. i Kiruna 34, i Örebro 36, stat :insp. i Luleå 40, i Olskroken 41, överinsp. där 44, tillika chef f. Sävenäs rangerbangård, Gbgs hamnbana, Gbg Tingstad, Gbgs frihamn o. Sannegårdens stat. Kom-m:fuHm. i Orsa 20-22. RVO, RTysk-ÖO, GMnr, SvRKHt.
translated: Lundin, Eric Gunnar, Senior Inspector at SJ (Swedish Railways), Gothenburg, born on 8th December 1885 in Stockholm to Johan Wilhelm L., a civil servant, and Stina Andersson. Married on 20th with Elise Holmgren. Children: Elsa, born in 1921, Lars, born in 1927. Completed Realexamen in 1908. Started working at the State Archives in 1912, became Senior Clerk in Helsingborg in 1930, and Bureau Assistant in Kiruna in 1934. Moved to Örebro in 1936, became State Inspector in Luleå in 1940, and in Olskroken in 1941. Promoted to Senior Inspector in Olskroken in 1944. Also served as the Chief of Sävenäs Sorting Yard, Gothenburg Harbor Railway, Gothenburg Tingstad, Gothenburg Free Port, and Sannegården State. Military Commissioned Officer in Orsa from 1920 to 1922. Decorations: Royal Order of Vasa, Royal Order of the Sword, German-Östersund Order, and Military Medal of Merit.

employmentHistory.namedPosition: Sävenäs Sorting Yard, Gothenburg Harbor Railway, Gothenburg Tingstad, Gothenburg Free Port, Sannegården State
